the automaker's recovery plan after its 2009 bankruptcy filing and near-collapse. "2011 needs to be characterized as the year of execution," Chief Executive Sergio Marchionne told analysts and journalists during a conference call. We need to execute on what we promised to do. Chrysler, which is now 25 percent owned by Fiat, projected it will sell 2 million cars and trucks worldwide in 2011, up from a little more than 1.5 million in sales in 2010.

of Republicans who like Mitch Daniels ' broad experience and fiscal credentials. Mitch Daniels has said he won't make a decision about running for president until after this year's legislative season ends in April. If( Mitch Daniels ) runs, I think it's hard for Mike Pence , because all the financial base in Indiana would likely go to Mitch Daniels , Charlie Black said. But Mike Pence also can't afford to wait to decide because he has a long way to go in building a fundraising network and a campaign team, and becoming better-known.

a memo saying that "we might be missing an opportunity" and wondering if more troops were needed. Donald Rumsfeld alleges that he later learned a CIA agent on the ground had requested just that, but adds: I never received such a request from either Tommy Franks or Tenet. And can not imagine denying it if I had. If someone thought Osama bin Laden was cornered, as later claimed, I found it surprising that Tenet had never called me to urge Tommy Franks to support their operation. Donald Rumsfeld 's explanation? "Their recollections may be imperfect."
